column2: data = read.table(file = file.path(path,file_name), header = T, sep = delim, skip = 0, stringsAsFactors = F, strip.white = T,fill = T)
sub_sub_data = data %>% filter(Station == sn, Date.Time == tm)
write.csv(sub_sub_data, file = file.path(path,"split",paste("35XI20090905","_",sn,"_",which(unique(sub_data$Date.Time) == tm),"_from_", "TARA_physical",".csv", sep = "")), row.names = F)
